document_data.title: Art Imitates Life
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Art Imitates Life''''' is an adventure in the [[Living City]] organized play campaign for [[Dungeons & Dragons]] 3{{rd}} edition.

{{Quote|Mystery abounds at a local art gallery as adventurers investigate a series of strange disappearances and odd occurrences. What happens when "Art Imitates Life" and then tries to choke the life from the investigators? Adventurers will have different views of "performance" art, "oil on canvas" and "life-like" sculptures after this adventure.}}
